DashboardContentView.description: A dashboard view that contains a set of visualizations and filters for a specific screen mode.

filterGroups.description: Filter groups that are defined on the dashboard/view level.

filters.description: Filters that are defined on the dashboard/view level.

options.description: Dashboard options for the current view.

DashboardContentView.title: view

DashboardContentVizItem.description: A chart or filter item in a dashboard.

limit.description: Limits for the data query, useful for big datasets.

position.description: Position and size of a dashboard item on the dashboard.

slots.description: Slots of the dashboard item. They may define columns of the table, parts of the bar chart, etc.

sort.description: Sorting settings. For "regular-table" it's an array, for others just an object.

type.description: Type of the item, for example, "bar-chart", "evolution-number", etc.

DashboardContentVizItem.title: item

level.description: Note: it can be number or null in the runtime dashboard contents JSON.

subGroups.description: Item filter subgroups. Has the same structure as filter group.

datasetLinks.description: List of datasets that are used on the dashboard. It's a hash, a key is a dataset uuid, value is joins - array of dataset uuids.

disableLookupFilters.description: Disables lookup filtering. Lookup filtering allows interactive filtering of linked datasets, with no data transformation needed.

filters.description: Filters that are defined on the dashboard level.

parameters.description: Filter parameters that are defined on the dashboard level.

syncScreenModes.description: Keeps items and their settings sync across different views (desktop, tablet, mobile).
